channel.title: Black Mesa Source Epic Conclusion
channel.description: If you blocked my Half-Life 3 why don't you make Half-Life 3 for yourself.Do you will keep waiting for year of 30XX for Half-Life 3?Half-Life 3 is nothing(mlg it's no use)like Half-Life 2 Episode 3 and Half-Life 2 Episode 4 Return To The Ravenholm.You made Black Mesa Source so you make next Half-Life 2 episodes. [youtube.com/watch?v=pB2VGHhD43o](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pB2VGHhD43o) I'm so sorry if I loose my temper [youtube.com/watch?v=WyeFHLfzGUs](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WyeFHLfzGUs) This is a proof [youtube.com/watch?v=KnOn6Da3Dic](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KnOn6Da3Dic) Valve Software and Arkane Studios aren't like Epic Games with reviving their old IP called Jazz Jackrabbit(maybe new installment).

item.title: Black Mesa Source Epic Conclusion
item.dc:creator: Kaltsu
item.description:
TheHalf-Life3:

VNN aka Tyler McVicker thinks Half-Life 3 is comming.The truth is it’s not comming.Liike urban legend Gabe Newell worked with Microsoft and he made Windows 1,2,2.1 and 2.2.Who made Windows 3.0?

You´re all over the place. Are you trying to say that Newell never worked for Microsoft, like it´s some sort of a consipiracy? And why are you so obsessed with this?
